Package org.drip.analytics.daycount

Class Summary
ActActDCParams Class contains parameters to represent the Act/Act day count.
DateAdjustParams This class contains the parameters needed for adjusting dates – holiday calendar and adjustment type.
DayCountBasis This class contains flags that indicate where the holidays are loaded from, as well as the holiday types and load rules
FixedHoliday This class contains the fixed holiday’s date and month.
FloatingHoliday This class contains the floating holiday’s month, day in week, and week in month.
Holiday This class is an abstraction around holiday and description.
LocHolidays This class contains the set of regular holidays and the weekend holidays for a location.
StaticHoliday This class a full date as a specific holiday
WeekendHoliday Holds the left and the right weekend days
